note.p: American. Daughter of Henry Grafton Chapman of Weymouth, Massachusetts, and his wife, the abolitionist campaigner Maria Weston Chapman. Married Auguste Laugel in Paris in 1854.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 November 2016)
Massachusetts, town and vital records, 1620–1988 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 November 2016)
